Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-40898 affecting package python-wheel for versions less than 0.33.6-8
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-40898 affecting package python-wheel for versions less than 0.33.6-8. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-wheel is earlier than 0.33.6-8, affected by CVE-2022-40898
